Steps to reproduce:

when i don't shutdown firefox properly, when i reboot or restart WM (fluxbox), if i get the "well this is embarassing" restore tabs window, when i press "restore" it does indeed restore the tabs, but the window gets minimized.
this behavior has been the same since FF 4.0 at least.  i'm now in 6.0.
i'm in gentoo linux, amd64, running fluxbox WM
